snippet: RIFKIN-COMRAS--Blanche. It is with deep sadness we mourn the loss of our longtime Board Member and friend. For over 40 years, Blanche was a valued member of our Board. She was a pillar of our community and will be missed by everyone who knew and loved her. Our condolences and prayers to her entire family and friends. Rest in peace. John Usdan, President Howard Martin, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: RIFKIN-COMRAS--Blanche. It is with deep sadness we mourn the loss of our longtime Board Member and friend. For over 40 years, Blanche was a valued member of our Board. She was a pillar of our community and will be missed by everyone who knew and loved her. Our condolences and prayers to her entire family and friends. Rest in peace. John Usdan, President Howard Martin, CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RIFKIN, COMRAS, BLANCHE
